member.name: T:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo
member.summary: Represents the information about a task, including its ID, title, type, developer, and guard.

member.name: P:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo.TaskID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the task.

member.name: P:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo.TaskTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the title or name of the task.

member.name: P:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo.TaskType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type or category of the task.

member.name: P:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo.Developer
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the developer assigned to the task.

member.name: P:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo.Guard
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the guard responsible for the task.

member.name: T:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.JsonTaskService
member.summary: Provides methods to read and write task information to and from JSON files.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.JsonTaskService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.JsonTaskService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The logger instance used to log messages and errors.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.JsonTaskService.ReadTaskFromJson(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the task information from a JSON file.
member.param: The path to the JSON file containing the task information.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the JSON file, or null if deserialization fails.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.JsonTaskService.WriteTaskToJson(Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the task information to a JSON file.
member.param: The object containing the task information to be serialized.
The path to the JSON file where the task information will be saved.

member.name: T:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.TaskService
member.summary: Service class to manage task-related operations, such as retrieving checks for a task.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.TaskService.#ctor(DoneTool.Data.DoneToolContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The database context used to interact with the DoneTool database.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.TaskService.GetChecksForTask(Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo)
member.summary: Retrieves the list of checks associated with a task.
member.param: The task information object containing details about the task.
member.returns: A list of associated with the task.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.TaskService.GetChecksForExistingTask(DoneTool.Models.Domain.TaskChecklist)
member.summary: Retrieves the checks for an existing task based on its checklist entry.
member.param: The task checklist entry corresponding to the task.
member.returns: A list of associated with the existing task.

member.name: M:Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Services.TaskService.CreateNewRelationships(Skyline.DataMiner.TaskDataMiner.Models.TaskInfo)
member.summary: Creates new relationships between the task and its checks, and returns the associated checks.
member.param: The task information object containing details about the task.
member.returns: A list of associated with the newly created task relationships.
